issue.title: [CF 726] New option of icon type CLEU
issue.body:
Is that possible to add a new option for Don't Refresh, it's like a editbox can set one number to control after how many times spell casted then start don't refresh.

For example i want to track how many Sinister Strike i casted, at now i only can track 2 times, i used (duration1 - duration2) to decide, i know it's so stupid to do that, but it's only way to do that. Sorry for bad english.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #726 | Raw

comments.body:
I just can't see this being used enough to warrant the amount of work that would need to go into creating and maintaining it. Sorry, but I really need to start drawing the line somewhere on feature requests.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
